content: As an AI language model, I don't know your physical abilities and personal preferences, but I can suggest a relatively easy hiking trail suitable for beginners - the Grey Mare's Tail waterfall trail. It's a short 2.5-mile round trip hike, and the path is well-maintained, but it still offers breathtaking views of the stunning waterfall, as well as the surrounding mountains and forests. It's also a great place to have a picnic at the picnic area with friends and family after the hike. Remember, always check the weather conditions and trail difficulty before beginning your hike, and be sure to bring proper gear and supplies!
